article_title: Cedar Park teen goes to Space Camp
article_text:
KXAN First Warning Weather meteorologist David Yeomans with the 3rd grade class of Caldwell Heights Elementary

It’s a leadership program designed to inspire the next generation of students to pursue careers in math and science. And it involves space.

Emily Ismail, a Cedar Park High School student, was Awarded a special scholarship from Honeywell to attend the 2014 Honeywell Leadership Challenge Academy. It’s held at the U.S. Space & Rocket Center in Huntsville, Alabama.

Ismail just got back and talks to Erin Cargile about what it was like.

article_summary:
Emily Ismail, a Cedar Park High School student, was Awarded a special scholarship from Honeywell to attend the 2014 Honeywell Leadership Challenge Academy.
KXAN First Warning Weather meteorologist David Yeomans with the 3rd grade class of Caldwell Heights ElementaryIt’s a leadership program designed to inspire the next generation of students to pursue careers in math and science.
Ismail just got back and talks to Erin Cargile about what it was like.
It’s held at the U.S. Space & Rocket Center in Huntsville, Alabama.
And it involves space.
